summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of a public street and highway to be known as Wilson Avenue, from the intersection of Dawson Street and Fifty-first Avenue South to the intersection of Hudson Street and Fiftieth Avenue South; providing for the changing and establishing of the curb grades of said avenue; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of the above described avenue, for the changing and establishing of the grades and the grading and regrading of the above described avenue in conformity with the grades established herein and for the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting on said avenue, and providing that the entire cost of such improvement shall be paid by special assessment on the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
